trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> type allows access to the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget> elements of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetSection> section element collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>類型可讓您存取<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget>的項目<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetSection>區段項目集合。

trans-unit.source: It belongs to a group that includes <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetSection>.
trans-unit.target: 它屬於群組，其中包含<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetSection>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an excerpt from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例摘錄自組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.%23ctor%2A>建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> class by using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetSection.ClientTargets%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>類別使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetSection.ClientTargets%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Before adding a client target to the collection, you must create a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget> object and initialize its <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget.Alias%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget.UserAgent%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 之前加入集合中的用戶端目標，您必須建立<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget>物件，並初始化其<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget.Alias%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget.UserAgent%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget> object to the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget>物件<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to get the collection, see to the code example in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得集合的資訊，請參閱中的程式碼範例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the keys for all the configuration elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection" /> 集合中包含之所有組態項目的索引鍵陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array of the keys for all of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> objects contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 中所包含之所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection" /> 物件的索引鍵陣列。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除所有的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The result of updating the configuration file after calling the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.Clear%2A> method is dependent upon the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode> value chosen.
trans-unit.target: 更新組態檔之後呼叫的結果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.Clear%2A>方法會取決於<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode>值選擇。

trans-unit.source: To update the configuration file you use one of these two methods: <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 您使用這兩種方法的其中一個可更新組態檔：<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A> when the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode> value is modified.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A>時<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode>修改值。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the following conditions apply:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法時，發生下列情況：

trans-unit.source: If you pass the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode.Full> or <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode.Modified> parameter value, then a `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳入<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode.Full>或<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode.Modified>參數值，則`clear`項目插入至`clientTarget`在目前的階層層級的組態檔的區段。

trans-unit.source: If you pass the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode.Minimal> parameter value, a series of `remove` elements are added to the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳入<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode.Minimal>參數值、 一系列的`remove`項目會加入`clientTarget`在目前的階層層級的組態檔的區段。

trans-unit.source: This removes all references to the `add` elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 這會移除所有參考`add`階層中較高層級的父組態檔中定義的項目。

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode.Minimal> enumeration value, one additional property on the collection affects what gets serialized to the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode.Minimal>其中一個集合上的其他屬性會影響到組態檔取得序列化項目的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The property is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.EmitClear%2A> and is `false` by default.
trans-unit.target: 屬性是<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.EmitClear%2A>而且`false`預設。

trans-unit.source: One of the following conditions applies:
trans-unit.target: 下列條件的其中一個適用於：

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.EmitClear%2A> is set to `true`, a `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.EmitClear%2A>設`true`、`clear`項目插入至`clientTarget`在目前的階層層級的組態檔的區段。

trans-unit.source: This removes all references to the `add` elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 這會移除所有參考`add`階層中較高層級的父組態檔中定義的項目。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.EmitClear%2A> is set to `false`, the `clear` element is removed from the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.EmitClear%2A>設為`false`、`clear`項目移除`clientTarget`在目前階層架構層級，如果它存在組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.Clear%2A> method actually deletes the `add` elements defined in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.Clear%2A>方法實際上會刪除`add`中定義的項目`clientTarget`在目前的階層層級的組態檔的區段。

trans-unit.source: It also removes all references to the `add` elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 它也會移除所有參考`add`階層中較高層級的父組態檔中定義的項目。

trans-unit.source: The `add` elements are not deleted from the `clientTarget` section of the parent configuration files.
trans-unit.target: `add`項目不會刪除從`clientTarget`父組態檔的區段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes all the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget> objects from the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會移除所有<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget>物件從<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to get the collection, see the code example in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得集合的資訊，請參閱中的程式碼範例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The collection index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: 所要取得之元素的集合索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection key for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元素的集合索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the key.
trans-unit.target: 含有索引鍵值的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" />。

trans-unit.source: The collection index of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的集合索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得在指定之索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The user agent's name.
trans-unit.target: 使用者代理程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The alias of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 的別名。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> object with the specified alias from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除具有指定別名的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.Remove%2A> method deletes the `add` element in the `clientTarget` section at the current hierarchy level and inserts a `remove` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.Remove%2A>方法刪除`add`中的項目`clientTarget`> 一節，在目前的階層層級和插入`remove`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `remove` element effectively removes the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy but does not delete it.
trans-unit.target: `remove`項目會有效地移除參考`add`父層組態中定義的項目階層中較高層級的檔案，但不會刪除它。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget> object from the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例移除<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget>物件從<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to get the collection, see the code example in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得集合的資訊，請參閱中的程式碼範例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.Remove%2A> method deletes the `add` element in the `clientTarget` section at the current hierarchy level and inserts a `remove` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.Remove%2A>方法刪除`add`中的項目`clientTarget`> 一節，在目前的階層層級和插入`remove`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `remove` element effectively removes the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy but does not delete it.
trans-unit.target: `remove`項目會有效地移除參考`add`父層組態中定義的項目階層中較高層級的檔案，但不會刪除它。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget> object from the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例移除<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget>物件從<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to get the collection, see the code example in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得集合的資訊，請參閱中的程式碼範例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The collection index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 集合索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> object with the specified collection index.
trans-unit.target: 移除具有指定集合索引的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method deletes the `add` element in the `clientTarget` section at the current hierarchy level and inserts a `remove` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法刪除`add`中的項目`clientTarget`> 一節，在目前的階層層級和插入`remove`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `remove` element effectively removes the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy but does not delete it.
trans-unit.target: `remove`項目會有效地移除參考`add`父層組態中定義的項目階層中較高層級的檔案，但不會刪除它。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget> object from the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例移除<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget>物件從<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to get the collection, see to the code example in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得集合的資訊，請參閱中的程式碼範例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ClientTargetCollection>類別概觀。
